name: type: chore
description: A tedious but necessary task often paying technical debt

name: type: epic
description: A feature idea that is large enough to require a sprint (5 days) or more and has smaller sub-issues.

name: type: dependencies
description: Issues related to npm dependencies

name: type: bug
description: Suspected or confirmed bug (defect) in the code

name: type: breaking
description: Breaking changes

name: type: maintenance
description: Internal changes that don't affect the public

name: type: enhancement
description: New feature or enhancement of existing functionality

name: type: question
description: A question needs to be answered before progress can be made on this issue

name: type: discussion
description: Share your constructive thoughts on how to make progress with this issue

name: type: documentation
description: Improvements or additions to documentation

name: type: design
description: Improvements or additions to design

name: priority: low
description: Deprioritised until all other medium priority issues are complete.

name: priority: medium
description: Third priority. Considered "Nice to Have". Not urgent.

name: priority: high
description: Second highest priority, should be worked on as soon as the Critical issues are finished

name: priority: critical
description: Critical priority issue. This is costing us every minute that passes.

name: status: good starter issue
description: A beginner-friendly issue that is a good starting point for a new person

name: status: help wanted
description: Extra attention is needed

name: status: wontfix
description: This will not be worked on

name: status: duplicate
description: This issue or pull request already exists

name: status: blocked
description: :fire: Core team's HIGHEST priority, blocking critical work

name: semantic-release
description: Related to semantic release

name: released
description: Released on production version

name: released on @beta
description: Released on beta/development version

name: released on @main
description: Released on main/production version

name: status: invalid
description: This doesn't seem right

name: type: user-feedback
description: Feedback from people using the App

name: related: community
description: Related to community, community telegram bot and community telegram group
